name: Leaf Watcher
description:
Play as a kitty trying its best to catch the falling leaves. The only issue is there's a closed window in the way... A true exercise in futility.

Luckily, cats can have an imagination too, and this one is living proof. 

Claw your way through increasing leaf-fall (and the occasional flurry) in this comfy little cat game where the only goal is to entertain the lil guy. 

CONTROLS: 

'Left-Click' or 'Spacebar' to attack.

 'A' and 'D' to aim.

CREDITS:

3D Art: rutrine (Hun)

Code: RoboReese, Arrow (Bun)

Music: RoboReese

Cat VA: Kobes the Cat ♥

Font: Mangabey by Niskala Huruf

Made in a week for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022
